name: WhisperLens
description: WhisperLens is an open-source AI toolkit for speech-to-text and sentiment analysis in low-resource languages. Built with Whisper and lightweight models, it enables offline, privacy-first voice applications for education, healthcare, and local communities.

funding.description: Seeking funding to build an open-source AI toolkit that converts speech to actionable insights for low-resource languages. This empowers NGOs, educators, and developers to build voice-enabled tools for underserved regions.
